algorithm: The new algorithm calculates a score for each item based on the logarithm of its value-to-weight ratio, scaled by the square root of the remaining capacity, to prioritize items that are more valuable per unit of weight and fit well within the available space.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(weight, value, remaining_capacity):
    if weight > remaining_capacity:
        return -1e9
    # Calculate the log of the value-to-weight ratio
    log_value_per_weight = np.log(value / weight)
    # Scale the score by the square root of the remaining capacity
    score = log_value_per_weight * np.sqrt(remaining_capacity)
    return score
